name: E. Anya and Cubes
statement:
Anya loves to fold and stick. Today she decided to do just that.Anya has
cubes lying in a line and numbered from to from left to right, with
natural numbers written on them. She also has stickers with exclamation
marks. We know that the number of stickers does not exceed the number of
cubes.Anya can stick an exclamation mark on the cube and get the
factorial of the number written on the cube. For example, if a cube
reads , then after the sticking it reads , which equals .You need to
help Anya count how many ways there are to choose some of the cubes and
stick on some of the chosen cubes at most exclamation marks so that the
sum of the numbers written on the chosen cubes after the sticking
becomes equal to . Anya can stick at most one exclamation mark on each
cube. Can you do it?Two ways are considered the same if they have the
same set of chosen cubes and the same set of cubes with exclamation
marks.
